home.heroDescription: We develop innovative solutions in artificial intelligence and natural language processing.

news.title: Discover Our Latest Advances
news.description: Stay up to date with our latest research, featured publications, and breakthroughs in AI, NLP, and emerging technologies.
news.noNewsDescription: Please check back later to see the latest updates from our research team.

history.title: The History of GILIA
history.description: Learn about the journey of the Research Group in Languages and Artificial Intelligence at the Faculty of Computer Science, National University of Comahue.

2010.title: Foundation of GILIA
2010.description: Creation of the Research Group in Languages and Artificial Intelligence at the Faculty of Computer Science of UNCo, through Resolution CD FAIF No. 052/10.
achievements: First projects accredited by the University

2012.title: First Publications
2012.description: Beginning of the group's scientific output with active participation in national reference conferences.
achievements: Training of the first thesis students

2015.title: Academic Consolidation
2015.description: Strengthening of research lines in Intelligent Agents, Semantic Web, Formal Models, and Knowledge Representation.
achievements: Supervision of undergraduate and master's theses

2018.title: Team Expansion
2018.description: Significant growth of the group with the incorporation of new research faculty and active human resource training.
achievements: New lines in Computer Science Education

2021.title: Outreach and Extension
2021.description: Development of university extension projects and creation of digital educational resources oriented to the community.

2024.title: Projection and Networks
2024.description: Participation in national academic networks and sustained growth with presence in multiple conferences and scientific publications.
achievements: Training of new generations of researchers

extensionLines.title: Extension Lines
